Description.SourceString: Perks are extra bonuses that you earn as milestone rewards. Once selected, Perk Bonuses apply to all of your Heroes. You can acquire perks by leveling up and casting Heroes into the Monster Pit.
Description.LocalizedString: Perks are extra bonuses that you earn as milestone rewards. Once selected, Perk Bonuses apply to all of your Heroes. You can acquire perks by leveling up and casting Heroes into the Monster Pit.
